text: I had this dream last night where I wished so badly to fly above my dad's corpse and I took to the sky seeing his body, but as I approached him I tumbled to the ground and became him. I felt horror.
Yeah I feel like it means something... maybe that I can't seem to become independant because I blame him for everything. It is so hard but what can I do?
I don't think I am angry with him but sometimes his chewing really... gets to me. It's like he has a point to prove or something, the way he cews his food round and round and round
